SEARCH
程序包 movies

接口 MovieList

所有已知实现类:
MovieLinkedList
public interface MovieList
This interface provides a list of movies. Movies can be added and removed. We can also get a subset of these movies.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    add(int index, Movie movie)
    Add a Movie to the list at the specified position.
    MovieList
    moviesDirectedBy(Person director)
    Create a list of movies made by a particular director.
    MovieList
    moviesMade(TimeIndicator timeIndicator, int year)
    Create a list of movies made in a certain period (before, during or after a certain year).
    boolean
    remove(Movie movie)
    Removes the first occurrence of the specified movie from this list, if it is present.

  • 方法详细资料

    • add

      void add(int index, Movie movie) throws IndexOutOfBoundsException
      Add a Movie to the list at the specified position.
      参数:
      index - index at which the movie is to be inserted
      movie - movie to be inserted
      抛出:
      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index 无效输入：'<' 0 || index > size())

    • remove

      boolean remove(Movie movie)
      Removes the first occurrence of the specified movie from this list, if it is present. If this list does not contain the movie, it is unchanged.
      参数:
      movie - movie to be removed from this list, if present
      返回:
      true if the movie was found; false otherwise

    • moviesMade

      MovieList moviesMade(TimeIndicator timeIndicator, int year)
      Create a list of movies made in a certain period (before, during or after a certain year).
      参数:
      timeIndicator - indicates if the movies we want were made before, during or after a year
      year - the year
      返回:
      the list of movies made during that period

    • moviesDirectedBy

      MovieList moviesDirectedBy(Person director)
      Create a list of movies made by a particular director.
      参数:
      director - the director
      返回:
      the list of movies made by that director
